设置 gutter

* {
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  <g-row class="demoRow" gutter="10">
  <g-col span="8">
    <div class="demoCol">8</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="8">
    <div class="demoCol">8</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="8">
    <div class="demoCol">8</div>
  </g-col>
</g-row>
<g-row class="demoRow" gutter="10">
  <g-col span="6">
    <div class="demoCol">6</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="6">

* {
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

 <g-row class="demoRow" gutter="10">
  <g-col span="8">
    <div class="demoCol">8</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="8" offset="8">
    <div class="demoCol">8</div>
  </g-col>
</g-row>
<g-row class="demoRow" gutter="10">
  <g-col span="6" offset="6">
    <div class="demoCol">6</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="6" offset="6">
    <div class="demoCol">6</div>
  </g-col>
</g-row>
<g-row class="demoRow" gutter="10">
  <g-col span="4">
    <div class="demoCol">4</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="4" offset="4">
    <div class="demoCol">4</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="4" offset="8">
    <div class="demoCol">4</div>
  </g-col>
</g-row>
<g-row class="demoRow" gutter="10">
  <g-col span="2">
    <div class="demoCol">2</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="2" offset="2">
    <div class="demoCol">2</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="2">
    <div class="demoCol">2</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="2" offset="2">
    <div class="demoCol">2</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="2">
    <div class="demoCol">2</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="2" offset="2">
    <div class="demoCol">2</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="2">
    <div class="demoCol">2</div>
  </g-col>
  <g-col span="2" offset="2">
    <div class="demoCol">2</div>
  </g-col>
</g-row>
隐藏代码

g-row/Attributes

参数 说明 类型 可选值 默认值
gutter 栅格的间隙，单位为 px String , Number —— ——

g-col/Attributes

参数 说明 类型 可选值 默认值
ipad,narrow-pc,pc,wide-pc 不同屏幕宽度下分栏所占宽度的配置参数，键对应分栏所占宽度，值对应分栏前空隙宽度。mobile-first，ipad、narrow-pc、pc、wide-pc对应 min-width 分别为 577px、769px、993px、1201px Object ipad,narrow-pc,pc,wide-pc --
offset 偏移量 String,Number -- --
